inclusion.criterion: taken oral bisphosphonates (risedronate or alendronate) for five years or more
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: holiday from the medication, or those who have been on a holiday for up to 3 months
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current steroid treatment at or greater than 5 mg/day prednisone or equivalent
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: The use of any other bone active medication other than risedronate or alendronate
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has been on bisphosphonates for more than five years and has a 25(0H) D level above 30 ng/ml. However, they are currently taking steroids which may be an exclusion criterion.
